name: Protect the Blue Rectangle
description:
Smack, block, and push away hostile shapes from your precious blue rectangle in this blocky, fast-paced, survival-sports game!

Hostile blocks launch themselves at the standing blue rectangle. Use your bat to knock them away and shield your blue rectangle from toppling over!

Use the bat in creative ways to keep the blue rectangle out of harms way!

Use your own blocky body to stop the shapes from continuing any further!

Can you PROTECT THE BLUE RECTANGLE?

Latest Devlog: Welcome to Protect the Blue Rectangle!

A note from Duckling Interactive:

Hi everyone! Thanks for checking this prototype out! The hope is that the game can expand to include more levels and more ways to protect the blue rectangle. Consider this a version 0.1 for the time being, so this is a very bare bones version of what I plan for this game. Still, I hope you have some fun with this prototype and look forward to the future.

I'm pretty early in my game development journey as I'm learning all that I can, but I still wanted to create something to show for all the things I've been learning.

This is an ongoing project, so please look forward to what's coming next!

-R
